escaperoom

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • escaperoom.Game

  • final class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Randomly generates successive rooms. User must move through rooms using intuitive console commands.
    Version:
    3/15/17
    Author:
    NTropy, Charles Dorsey-Ward, Timothy Dovci, Samantha Cole

    • Field Detail

      • eastDoor

        private static boolean eastDoor
        Tracks continuity, e.g. if player left room on east side they begin on west side of next room.

      • northDoor

        private static boolean northDoor
        Tracks continuity, e.g. if player left room on east side they begin on west side of next room.

      • southDoor

        private static boolean southDoor
        Tracks continuity, e.g. if player left room on east side they begin on west side of next room.

      • westDoor

        private static boolean westDoor
        Tracks continuity, e.g. if player left room on east side they begin on west side of next room.

      • runToggle

        private static boolean runToggle
        Tracks if player is sprinting. If true, player moves two spaces at a time. If false, player moves one space at a time.

      • start

        private static boolean start
        Tracks if player is in the first room. Used to determine how a room should be initialized.

      • currentIntX

        private static int currentIntX
        Player's x,y position in the array.

      • currentIntY

        private static int currentIntY
        Player's x,y position in the array.

      • deskCounter

        private static int deskCounter
        Number of desks in a room.

      • tempIntX

        private static int tempIntX
        Keeps tracks of players last position after a move.

      • tempIntY

        private static int tempIntY
        Keeps tracks of players last position after a move.

      • turnCount

        private static int turnCount
        Tracks number of turns player has taken.

      • trophy

        private static boolean trophy
        Easter egg trophies in game, tracks if player has picked one up.

      • trophyCount

        private static int trophyCount
        Tracks how many trophies player has.

                         int x)
        Creates a new game and handles user inputs.

      • generateRoom

        private static int[][] generateRoom(int x,
                                    int y)
        Generates a new room.
        Parameters:
        x - width bound of room
        y - height bound of room
        Returns:
        generated room
